website_summaries.verdict: A traditional shoe horn that is made to last. Its rugged design and budget price make it a good deal.
pros: Solid stainless steel with a wide top to fit almost any foot
Classic, double-sided design w/precise angle for easy shoe placement
cons: At 7.5 inches, it's not ideal for boots
You have to sit to use it

customer_reviews.title: Good, well made shoe horn.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this hoping to get a shoehorn not too narrow, like plastic one I picked up at the corner pharmacy store - I'm a USA size 10 "normal" and the shoehorn fits well. Should work for everyone except maybe NBA players (how do they cope with this issue, anyway ? - I digress) Yep, good wide horn just like in olden days, look like made to outlive me. Has a very smooth finish, allows the sock to slide. Would recommend to a friend if it ever came up.
customer_reviews.author: sfrenchfl

customer_reviews.title: Life changer for putting on shoes
customer_reviews.text: My whole life I thought these things were for old men and I never thought i'd need one. Well I bought a nice pair of shoes that were kind of tough to get on so I thought I would try a shoe horn. Turns out I loved it so much I use it for all my other shoes, now I don't even have to unlace if I don't want to and I don't damage the back of my shoes from pushing down on them. This particular shoe horn feels really sturdy and is a great size
customer_reviews.author: Connor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews said it was sharp around the edges, so that was the first thing I checked. Both were smooth and no sharp edges. My husband wears a 10 so no cutting on shoe leather either. Like it, that it is a little longer than most. Came on time and exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: pam

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Shoe horn should last for years!
customer_reviews.text: My mother was thrilled to receive her new shoe horns that we ordered for her. They arrived ahead of schedule and were wide enough for her arthritic hands to hold on to when putting her shoes on herself. Giving her on more small piece of independence back.
customer_reviews.author: 9kids

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as you would imagine. It's a set of shoe horns used to aid in putting on difficult shoes. They work very nicely and because they are stainless, the socks glide right over the horn.
customer_reviews.author: E.J.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cheap, well constructed shoe horn.
customer_reviews.text: It's a shoe horn. The paint is some sort of enameled paint on top of what is pretty sturdy steel. I was hoping it would just be a darker raw metal, but oh well. I got this because my previous shoe horn cracked in the middle and over the course of many bends, it finally gave in and broke. This one seems a fair but sturdier, and I can imagine it lasting for at least the 10 years of the previous one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Teguh Hofstee

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product, until it warps.
customer_reviews.text: This felt like a solid shoe horn, until it bent out of nowhere one day renting it completely useless. I totally understand price vs quality and did not expect the sturdiest product ever, but at less than a year it's not great. Used with high top sneakers, worst part the product did not show signs of wear, it simply just bent. Either way will be looking for a better quality replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Bart Rogacewicz

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: After blistering my thumb using it to try and pry my foot in my new oxfords, I knew it was time to get a shoehorn. These are well made, you get two in a pack, and they're a great price. I've had no more difficulty putting on my shoes with them and they keep my feet from bending the back of the leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: Really are nice shoe horns. I am an amputee and need help getting my shoe on the fake foot because it is too big and these are defiantly the best shoe horns I have had. Love how small and sturdy they are
customer_reviews.author: Jake Barber

customer_reviews.title: Never thought I'd need one again!
customer_reviews.text: But an arm injury made it necessary. Perfect length for me, and the double side helps. Hard to explain, but my running shoes make 2 of them helpful. they stay in my gear bag, just wish they had a bottle opener on one end as well...
customer_reviews.author: I am, Adam Savage!

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's wide, but managable.
customer_reviews.text: This shoehorn will not break! It's solid metal and will last a long time. I scoured Amazon for a narrower shoehorn because it said this one was a little wide. Yes, it's wide, but I found that it works for my shoes (size 8) and my kids shoes (kids size 8). So if it can work for them, it'll work on your small (or big) shoes too.
customer_reviews.author: JOEL G.

customer_reviews.title: Highest Quality Shoe Horns
customer_reviews.text: I thought that I ordered one but 2 arrived. Needed it to get low cut boots on. Order a longer size for knees high boots. I plan to use it in the warmer weather too. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Towers2000

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: For my dad. He's never satisfied, wanted them to be longer, but they were exactly as described. Thanks 😊
customer_reviews.author: MargeryRed

customer_reviews.title: On time and as described
customer_reviews.text: Questions regarding fit, etc not applicable here. Shoe horn arrived on time and is exactly as described. Have not needed a shoe horn for years but wearing a new orthotic that is NOT the type that fits neatly in the bottom of one's shoe. Had difficulty getting my shoe on without squashing the Achilles notch. Using the shoe horn has stopped that difficulty. Guessing it would also be useful for putting on ankle boots. Thanks, Shacke.
customer_reviews.author: BRsMom

customer_reviews.title: Solid Feel
customer_reviews.text: I have had metal shoe horns before but none with as substantial feel as these two. They are expensive compared to the plastic ones but these will last a life time.
customer_reviews.author: William Bentrim

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Came on time. For the price can't be beat. Good to have extra's around the house for dad.
customer_reviews.author: Long Gone

customer_reviews.title: These are nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great stocking stuffers! These will make great stocking stuffers for the men I find it hard to buy for! Great quality and nice finish.
customer_reviews.author: Yellowbird

customer_reviews.title: Easy use for arthritic person.
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful for my Mom who is suffering with dementia and arthritis. She finds it much easier to put on her shoes now. With this item being double sided, I keep one close at hand for her and the other in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Mayrant

customer_reviews.title: Great for converse!!
customer_reviews.text: Great little shoe horn. I use them to put on my converse which can be quite stubborn to get on due to the canvas construction, the heel always likes to fold in when trying to put them on. This solves the problem 100%. It is a little tricky to use on High tops but once you get it down its easy peasy.
customer_reviews.author: David Gibb

customer_reviews.title: good shoe horn but !
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality shoe horn but I wish someone would make a wider model and a little longer for seniors. thank you
customer_reviews.author: John Rouselle

customer_reviews.title: If it doesn't fit, you must acq...buy this shoe horn!
customer_reviews.text: These tux shoes were killing me until I bought this shoe horn. Finally, pain and stress is alleviated.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These shoehorn provide what you want them to do great value

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I bought the exact same one from the same seller on eBay which is why I purchased a 2nd one for my son’s gym bag. QUALITY! Very sturdy metal! This is the only shoe horn I will ever buy/use.

customer_reviews.title: A good shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: The shoe horn is strong, smooth, and well made. It works perfectly. I will add, after 2 months of use that this is the best and easiest to use shoe horn I have used. It also has a convenient hole in the handle to hand the horn up for storage.

customer_reviews.title: Shacke Metal Shoe Horn 7.5"...
customer_reviews.text: This has been great! Having limited mobility in my back, bending down to put on a pair of sneakers or especially boots, can be a real challenge, but this makes that much easier. Thanks very much to the seller for fast shipping! And a really good product at a great price!

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe horn
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband who has diabetes and his feet swell a lot and it's hard to slide his heel into his shoes and slipper. The shoe horn works so that his heel doesn't crush down the back of his shoe. Like the coating that it has on it also. Much nicer then that ugly steel color.

customer_reviews.title: they work good I have tried plastic they bend to much and ...
customer_reviews.text: they work good I have tried plastic they bend to much and to long,this is a good product I would buy again

customer_reviews.text: A bit wide. Would prefer a shorter length for travel.

customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy shoe horns but wide. They work well for me but if you have a narrow heal, these are not for you.

customer_reviews.title: Great solid shoehorn
customer_reviews.text: Great shoehorn. Solid but not too thick to get the job done comfortably.

customer_reviews.title: Can a shoehorn be designed by a genius?
customer_reviews.text: I never imagined that I would praise a shoehorn, but this one is so remarkably constructed, so sturdy, so smoothly finished, and so well designed with the shape and size and angle of the handle, that even the toughest fitting shoes are leveraged on effortlessly. I am ordering another one to keep at work and a third one to keep at the gym locker! If only our government administrators were as effective as this manufacturer! LOL

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done

product_meta.title: Shacke Metal Shoe Horn 7.5" inches – Double Sided Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
The Perfect Reversible Shoehorn That Fits All Feet Size 

High Quality Heavy Duty Stainless Steel Metal Shoehorn 

A good shoehorn has one purpose and one purpose only and that's to make putting on your shoes a breeze without a fuss. The Shacke 7.5" does just that by offering a reversible metal shoehorn that will fit most, if not all, feet size. Made from a high quality durable stainless steel it is the perfect size to fit in the palm of your hand yet small enough to take with you while you’re travelling. Our shoehorn has the perfect tilted angle to make putting on your shoes or boot with ease. 

Shack 7.5 Inch Shoe Horn Overview:

-Made From High Quality Durable Stainless Steel Metal 
-Wide Mouth to Help Slip Into Your Shoes With Ease 
-Perfect Tilted Angle That Has Been Proven To Be The Best For a Shoehorn 
-Ideal for Assisted Mobility and Seniors
feature_bullets: Made from High Quality 7.5" Short Stainless Steel
Perfect for Traveling and Storage Double Sided / Reversible Shoehorn for Large, Medium, to Smaller Feet
Wide Mouth End for Sturdy and Easy Usage
Perfect Angle for Sliding Feet Into Shoes
Silver Spoon Aid – Shoehorn For Men, Women, Children, Seniors, and the Elderly
